title: Weight Wise App
description: Estimate obesity levels using multiclass classification machine learning algorithms such as Decision Tree, Knn, Logistic Regression and multiclass methods like "One-vs-One" (OvO) ve "One-vs-Rest" (OvR).

title: Datafolio
description: Interactive Power BI CV dashboard: Experience, projects and skills.

title: Olist E-commerce Dashboard
description: The Olist E-commerce Dashboard aims to provide an in-depth analysis of e-commerce data using MS SQL Server for data management and Power BI for visualization. This project covers the end-to-end data pipeline from raw dataset exploration to business insights through interactive reports.

title: New Year's Resolutions Project
description: Twitter Resolution Analysis: This project analyzes tweets to explore sentiment, resolution popularity, and trends based on user activity, geography, and demographics.

title: Holiday Events Analysis
description: Walmart Sales Prediction: Predicting sales in the retail industry using Machine Learning Algorithms.

title: Credit Card Fraud
description: Anomaly Detection Project: Predicting credit card fraud in the banking industry using machine learning algorithms.

title: Bank Customer Churn Prediction Project
description: Predicting customer churn in the banking industry using machine learning algorithms.
